Remember to also select the corresponding checkbox below each traitline. This is necessary, because many traits grant conditional bonus stats and you might get different results with different conditional traits.":"请从这里选择特性。请记住同时勾选每个特性线下方的复选框。这是必要的，因为有些特性在不同条件下会给予不同效果，不同条件的特性选项会导致不同的结果。","Selected:":"已选择：","Shared Build":"分享的配置","Show all possible modifiers":"显示所有的特性效果","Sigil 1":"法印1","Sigil 2":"法印2","Skill Coefficients":"技能系数","Skills":"技能","Skills Template":"技能模板","Special Durations":"特殊持续时间","Stat Infusion Slots":"属性灌注槽","Stats from affixes":"装备词条属性总和","Status:":"状态：","Switch to %-wise damage distribution":"切换为百分比伤害分布","Target AR":"目标痛苦抗性","Target settings":"目标设置","The gear optimizer is currently in beta!
